text: Ghaznawi () is an Afghan family name meaning "from Ghazni (Afghanistan)". Notable people with the surname include: * Hassan Ghaznavi, poet * Maw'dud Ghaznavi, Ghaznavid dynasty ruler * Mohammad Ghaznavi, Ghaznavid dynasty ruler * Shatir Ghaznavi, a playwright, lyricist and story/screenplay dialogue writer for movies
title: Ghaznavi (surname)
